name: BierBelt - Yellow Chevrons
description: The Yellow Chevrons BierBelt is perfect for relaxing on sunny days...take advantage of them while you can! All BierBelts feature: - Versatile design: Carry 6-packs, 12-packs (bottles or cans), or boxed wine, etc with ease! - Self contained storage: Roll it up and secure it with the built-in buckle. - Two pockets: Great for cellphones, wallets, bottle openers, etc. - Sturdy construction: Made with nylon webbing and canvas cloth, they are built to last! Sewn in Fall River, MA, USA.
